resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103739</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103739</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202686</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Introduction to Animal Farm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung in eine Farm der Tiere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction à la ferme d'animaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução à fazenda animal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione al podere animale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στο ζωικό αγρόκτημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción a la granja</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson introduces students to Orwell's Animal Farm. They will summarize and reflect on reading and connect the novel to life in a meaningful way.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion stellt Kursteilnehmer Orwells zur 
Farm der Tiere vor. Sie fassen zusammen und reflektieren sich 
auf Messwert und schließen den Roman an das Leben in einer 
aussagefähigen Methode an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon présente des étudiants à la ferme 
des animaux d'Orwell. Ils récapituleront et réfléchiront sur 
la lecture et relieront le roman à la vie d'une voie signicative.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição introduz estudantes à fazenda animal
de Orwell. Sumariarão e refletirão na leitura e conectarão a 
novela à vida em uma maneira significativa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione introduce gli allievi al podere 
animale del Orwell. Ricapitoleranno e rifletteranno su lettura e
collegheranno il romanzo a vita in un modo espressivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα εισάγει τους σπουδαστές στο ζωικό 
αγρόκτημα Orwell. Θα συνοψίσουν και θα απεικονίσουν στην 
ανάγνωση και θα συνδέσουν το μυθιστόρημα με τη ζωή με έναν 
σημαντικό τρόπο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección introduce a estudiantes a la granja 
de Orwell. Resumirán y reflejarán en la lectura y conectarán 
la novela con la vida de una manera significativa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:TEACHERS CONNECT
FN:TEACHERS CONNECT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202686</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103739</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/introduction-to-animal-farm</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
